title: Sleep Headphones, 3D Sleep Mask Bluetooth Wireless Music Eye Mask, LC-dolida Sleeping Headphones for Side Sleepers Sleep Mask with Bluetooth Headphones Ultra-Thin Stereo Speakers Perfect for Sleeping
descriptions:
Slip into deeper, quieter sleep with LC-dolida’s 3-in-1 Sleep Headphones and 3D Bluetooth Sleep Mask. This ultra-comfortable, contoured eye mask blocks out light completely while built-in, ultra-thin stereo speakers deliver HD sound—so you can drift off to your favorite music, podcasts, white noise, or meditations without bulky earbuds or tangled wires.

Why you’ll love it:
- 3-in-1 design: Sleep mask + Bluetooth headphones + wireless headset for hands-free listening.
- Side-sleeper approved: 3D ergonomic contours and zero eye pressure keep lashes free and eyes relaxed, with an adjustable strap for a perfect, stay-put fit.
- Immersive, soothing sound: HD stereo speakers create a calm audio cocoon to help with insomnia, travel, meditation, yoga, and power naps.
- All-night battery: 8–10 hours of playtime from a quick 1–2 hour charge—ideal for full-night use.
- Latest Bluetooth 5.2: Fast pairing, stable connection, and low power consumption with up to 45 ft wireless range; works with most Bluetooth-enabled devices.
- Cool, breathable comfort: Hypoallergenic memory foam and soft, skin-friendly fabric feel light and airy while keeping you comfortable all night.
- Total blackout: Sunglass-shaped, contoured design prevents light leakage for deeper, more restorative rest.
- Thoughtful relief: Great for insomnia, migraine and dry-eye sufferers, and anyone sensitive to light.

Gift-ready for everyone: men, women, teens, moms, dads, teachers—perfect for Christmas, Valentine’s Day, birthdays, Father’s Day, Mother’s Day, Halloween, Easter, or as a unique cool tech gadget for someone who deserves better sleep.

Upgrade your nights, your flights, and your quiet-time routine with the LC-dolida Sleep Headphones—where plush comfort meets peaceful sound for your best rest yet.
